thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 12 of 110
thread.title: ANDREA

author: ANDREA
title: ANDREA
text: I thought the training and materials were very easy to follow, and kept me engaged! My only feedback would be to update the videos. They were a little outdated, making it a bit hard to focus. There were some points where the information in the videos didn't match the information provided in the training as well. Overall, it was a really easy way to learn the safety ways of Texas roads!
